WRITING.TEXT: Assuming you're part of Starbucks corporate, is there anything that you can do here?
He provided me a receipt with the purchase, apparently he purchased it with another card
Do you think anything could be done if a receipt is shown purchasing the card?

WRITING.TITLE: Gift Card Balance Removed?
WRITING.TEXT: I recently purchased a gift card off of someone for a discounted price. It was about $100. I know this is against the TOS but it seemed too good to turn down. However, just this morning, I've been notified that the balance on this card got removed due to fraudulent activities. I'm just wondering if there's anything i could do to solve this problem cause the dealer is gone now so i can't contact him. Thanks
